title: Bon Jovi - Burning Bridges (2015)320ak
description:
Burning Bridges is the upcoming thirteenth studio album by American rock band Bon Jovi, scheduled for release on August 21, 2015, through Mercury Records. It is the first album without former guitarist Richie Sambora, who left the band in 2013. 
According to Jon Bon Jovi, the album serves as a "fan record" to tie in with an accompanying international tour: "ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s songs that werenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t finished, that were finished, a couple of new ones like the one we released as a single "We Don't Run".

Burning Bridges will be followed by the band's fourteenth studio album in 2016.
The first single "Saturday Night Gave Me Sunday Morning" had its premiere at the Austrian Radio Ãƒâ€“3 Hitradio on July 17, 2015, and was released on July 31, 2015.

 Originally written in The Circle sessions, it was finished for this album. 
The song has been reviewed as a happy pop-rock song with a classic Bon Jovi sound that it's not too far away form the sound of the last two albums.

The second single, "We Don't Run," premiered at the Brazilian radio Radio Rock on July 20, 2015, and was released on July 31, 2015. 
It's a drum and bass driven rock song, with "meaty production and a shredding guitar solo". Unlike the previous single, this song was written exclusively for Burning Bridges.

Though not released as singles, the songs "Blind Love" and "A Teardrop to the Sea" were digitally released on August 7, 2015, followed by "I'm Your Man" on August 13, 2015.

Lyrics videos for all the songs have been released on Bon Jovi's YouTube account.
